companies.name: Chandra Daya
companies.reason: PT Chandra Daya Investasi shares surged as much as 35% in their first day of trading in Jakarta, with their IPO being oversubscribed by 560 times, indicating significant investor confidence in their business model and growth prospects in the energy sector.

companies.name: JBS Energy
companies.reason: JBS Energy plans to launch its IPO within the next few months and is expected to play a critical role in Indonesia's energy transition, capitalizing on strong government support for renewable energy initiatives.
